Html:
First thanks for the charts they are great and very useful.

I was just wondering if there is any way to customize the values in the series to have a % at the end in the Barchart or pie slice.

I know I can customize the ToolTip attribute but I could not find in the documentation a way to do it in the chart bar or pie slice itself.

Thanks!
I'm also looking for the answers. Please guide.
